title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Sep 29 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Sep 29 2021
description:
Milley testifies that Pelosi called him to discuss fear that Trump would nuke China. De Blasio on Kyrie Irving refusing to get vaccinated. NBA won't pay unvaxxed players. Matt Walsh lets loose at Virginia school board meeting. Terry McAuliffe says parents shouldn't tell schools what to teach. C&B take calls.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
